title: Animal Adaptations and Survival

vocab.definition: A special characteristic that helps an animal survive in its environment
An adaptation that helps animals blend in with their surroundings
The movement of animals from one place to another to find food or better living conditions
A deep sleep that helps animals survive winter when food is scarce

teachingNotes: Use images and videos of animals in their habitats. Discuss how adaptations help with survival needs. Connect to local wildlife when possible.

sample.question: How does a polar bear's thick fur help it survive?
How do desert plants save water?
What body part helps fish breathe underwater?
How do spines help a cactus survive?

truefalse.question: All animals have the same adaptations.
Thick fur helps animals stay cool in deserts.

multiplechoice.question: Which is an example of a behavioral adaptation?
Animals active at night are called:
An adaptation that helps an animal look like another dangerous animal is:
Which helps a penguin stay warm?

fillintheblank.question: A chameleon's ability to change color is an example of _____.
